page.name: Unlucky Dread Dagger
page.description: This dagger pulses with dark energy. At least it doesn't talk to you, right? Do you hear whispering?

page.name: Unlucky Dread Pillar
page.description: This staff channels the darkness within you, pulsing with power that makes your hair stand on end. But hey, at least it's quiet about it.
